line_1: Stubborn in pride, retain the mode,
line_2: And bear about the hairy load?

line_1: A Bedstead of the Antique Mode,
line_2: Compact of Timber many a Load,

line_1: While all, attempting many a different mode,
line_2: Would from their shoulders hitch time's heavy load,

line_1: On each a life of different mode
To mark some whim, some strange peculiar mode,
line_2: Forsaking nature's fair and open road

line_1: Promise, and never pay, and be the mode.
line_2: Strut in Iambics, totter in an Ode,

line_1: Till They, disdaining Nature's vulgar mode,
line_2: Flew off, and struck into another road,

line_1: For lo! these fav'rites of the ancient mode
line_2: Lie all neglected like the Birthday Ode.

line_1: The slaves of custom and establish'd mode,
line_2: With pack-horse constancy we keep the road

line_1: Quit this grand Errour, this dull College mode;
line_2: Be your pursuits the same, but change the road;

line_1: Methinks some DAEMON answers — "'Tis the mode!"
line_2: Why AV'RICE is the great all-worship'd God?
